name: The Analog Ensemble of Singing Kartoffeln
name_original: The Analog Ensemble of Singing Kartoffeln
description:
Come all listen to an exclusive concert from the one and only Analog Ensemble of Singing Kartoffeln. A unique group of talented singers with unequaled digital voices, all conducted by you! Let the show begin!

This game is better played with headphones. It's a musical game, who knew!

Controls
  • Mouse : Sing
  • F/F11 : Fullscreen
  • ESC: Free cursor
Credits

Art by Crysstalin

Voices from Dreamtonic's Synthesizer V Studio

Made for the Potat0s Jam 7, with theme “Let's Party Game!”.
